New Records: Sri Lanka's lowest total in T20I history is 77 runs
Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets for 7 runs
Ottneil Baartman claimed a wicket with his first delivery and maintained an economy rate of 2.25
Keshav Maharaj took 2 wickets in consecutive balls
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's performance was far from the level expected in such a critical match
The team's inability to build partnerships or counter the South African bowlers' tactics was evident
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York pitch proved challenging with inconsistent bounce and swing
The expansive outfield added to the batting side's woes
